title: Improve fetch error handling in scripts.js
description: Fetch operations in scripts.js (lines 25-41) lack timeout mechanisms and comprehensive error handling. Need to add proper error boundaries and timeout logic.

title: Improve mobile responsive design
description: styles.css media queries need expansion for very small devices (<576px). Navigation usability issues on small screens. Remove inline styles from header.html line 4.

title: Fix typo in CLAUDE.md
description: Line 27 of CLAUDE.md has typo: 'filesbd' should likely be 'files'

title: Modularize CSS architecture
description: styles.css is 849 lines and monolithic. Consider breaking into modules. Replace hardcoded pixel values with flexible units (rem/em). Reduce repeated selector overrides in media queries.

title: Add accessibility attributes to header
description: Social media icons in header.html are missing aria-label attributes. Dropdown menus lack keyboard navigation support. Need to ensure WCAG compliance.

title: Add SEO metadata to HTML pages
description: Missing meta tags for SEO, lang attributes in HTML elements, and structured data (JSON-LD) for events and organization information.

title: Add progressive enhancement and JS fallbacks
description: scripts.js needs fallback for users with JavaScript disabled, feature detection, and error logging mechanism.

title: Fix security issues with external links
description: External links in header.html and throughout the site are missing rel="noopener noreferrer" attributes, creating a security risk. Also need to add CSP headers.
